job.title: Live Streaming Studio Creator - like Steamyard or Emvux
job.description:
We seek a proficient freelancer to create a fully branded live streaming platform with advanced features, ensuring an outstanding user experience. This platform must seamlessly integrate with third-party services, including commercial music licensing platforms and email marketing tools. The ideal candidate should possess expertise in web development, API integration, and cross-platform compatibility.


Features

Unlimited streams
Multistream capability for up to 4 destinations
Custom RTMP support
Record your content
20GB Storage
Transcription feature
ISO Local recording for enhanced flexibility
Support for multiple cameras for dynamic perspectives
Web-Source integration for seamless content aggregation
320 kbit/s audio quality
Multistream capability for up to 9 destinations
Expanded 50GB Storage
Teams feature for collaborative streaming environments

Fully Customizable Pro-Scenes Builder
Easily create fully customized scenes in advance with our user-friendly drag-and-drop editor. While broadcasting, effortlessly play these pre-made scenes for seamless transitions, eliminating the need for on-the-fly editing

Push-to-Talk for direct communication with the speaker on stage
In addition to the internal chat feature, the host can discreetly converse with other guests without the audience being aware. This ensures the host has full control over the stream at all times.

Dedicated “green room”
Off-stage speakers can freely communicate with each other without interrupting the audience. Speakers can seamlessly be brought 'on-stage' with just the touch of a button.

Co-hosts
Collaborate with a colleague to co-host and produce the show, ensuring shared control and seamless coordination between both hosts.

Multiple local cameras
Enhance your streaming experience which allows you to incorporate multiple cameras, offering the flexibility to switch between different angles for a more dynamic and engaging presentation.

Can stream to major platforms like Twitch, LinkedIn, Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Rumble, Kick Amazon Live Vimeo, and YouTube.

Email Collection and Blast: Utilize exclusive links to collect emails from your audience, and leverage the built-in email blast and responder systems to engage with them effectively.

Commercial Music Licensing Integration: Seamlessly integrate a third-party service for commercial music licensing, ensuring compliance with copyright regulations and improving the overall quality of your content.

Mobile Extension: Extend your control over streaming and content creation to mobile devices with an all-in-one virtual control deck, providing convenient management capabilities on the go.

Virtual Stream Controller: Efficiently manage your streams using shortcuts, switchblade keys, analog dials, and programmable buttons. An extension for mobile devices allows for easy control, featuring 12 Haptic Switchblade Keys, 6 Tactile Analog Dials, and 8 Programmable Buttons.

Enhanced Customization: Offer advanced customization options for graphics, overlay designs, and scene transitions, allowing for personalized branding tailored to your specific needs.

Interactive Elements: Increase engagement with your audience by incorporating interactive elements such as polls, quizzes, and audience Q&A features, enhancing the overall viewer experience.

Advanced Analytics: Gain valuable insights into viewership metrics, audience demographics, and engagement levels through detailed analytics, enabling informed decision-making and content optimization.

Monetization Options: Explore various monetization strategies including subscription services, pay-per-view events, and donation systems, providing opportunities for revenue generation and business growth.


3GB Storage for your content
Support for up to 12 on-screen participants
Fully customizable overlays and backgrounds with your branding
Backstage mode for seamless coordination
Push-to-talk functionality for smooth communication
Full HD (1080P) resolution for crystal-clear visuals
Multistream capability to broadcast to 2 destinations simultaneously
Lower-thirds, banners, and tickers for professional presentation
Integrated chats to engage with your audience
On-screen templates for easy setup
Highlight comments feature to emphasize audience interaction
Virtual background options for added versatility
Screen sharing and slideshow features for dynamic presentations
Streaming limits to ensure smooth performance


Similar to Emvux.com or Restream but added features.

customFields.generatedDescriptionAI:
We are looking for a talented Live Streaming Studio Creator to join our team for a 3 to 6-month project. The ideal candidate should have experience in web development, SQL, .NET Framework, ASP.NET, video streaming, Ruby, JavaScript, web application, Java, and website redesign.

Your main responsibility will be to create a live streaming studio similar to platforms like Steamyard or Emvux. We need someone who can develop and implement the necessary features for a smooth and professional live streaming experience. 

To apply for this position, please submit a proposal detailing how you can help with this project. We would like to see examples of your past completed projects that showcase your skills in live streaming studio creation. Please include relevant links to these projects in your proposal. We look forward to reviewing your application and working with you to create an outstanding live streaming studio.
customFields.inputsTitleAI: Live Streaming Studio Creator - like Steamyard or Emvux
